column2: "Iyi ekyir no Jewfo afahyɛ bi durii
column3: na Jesus kɔr Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na Jerusalɛm abobow a wɔfrɛ no Nguantsen Kuropon no ho nsutaae bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no wɔ Hebriw kasa mu Bɛtsaeda a ɔwɔ nkrandaa enum."
"Na iyinom mu na ayarfo nyimpakuw pii
column3: enyifurafo
column4: mpakye
column5: nye hɔn a wɔyar mbubui dedae [rotweɔn nsu no no nwosowee."

column2: "Na odu mber bi a Ewuradze no bɔfoe sian nsutaae no mu bɔfon no; na obiara a nsu no fon ekyir no odzi kan kɔtɔ mu no
column3: yarba biara a ɔyar no
column4: onya ayarsa.]"
column5: "#5.3-4 Tsetse akyerɛwfo no binom mmfa iyi nnka ho."

column2: "Nna nyimpa bi wɔ hɔ a oedzi mfe eduasa awɔtwe wɔ ne yarba mu;"
"na Jesus hun dɛ ɔda hɔ
column3: na onyim dɛ ɔakyɛr hɔ no
column4: obisaa no dɛ
column5: Epɛ dɛ wo ho yɛ wo dzen anaa?"

column2: "Ɔyarfo no buaa dɛ
column3: Owura
column4: minnyi nyimpa biara a sɛ wɔbɔfon nsu no a ɔdze me to nsutaae no mu: na sɛ mereba a
column5: nna obi edzi m’enyim kan akɔtɔ mu."

column2: "Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Soɛr
column4: fa wo kɛtɛ na nantsew."

column2: "Na amonmu no ara nyimpa no ho yɛɛ no dzen
column3: na ɔfaa ne kɛtɛ
column4: na ɔnantsewee. Nna da no yɛ ahomgyeda."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Jewfo no see nyia wɔsaa no yarba no dɛ
column3: Ndɛ yɛ ahomgyeda
column4: innyi ho kwan dɛ esoa wo kɛtɛ."

column2: "Obuaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Nyia ɔmaa mo ho yɛɛ me dzen no
column4: ɔnoara na ɔsee me dɛ

column2: "Wobisaa no dɛ
column3: Woana nye nyimpa a ɔsee wo dɛ
column4: Fa wo kɛtɛ na nantsew

column2: "Nna nyia wɔsaa no yarba no nnyim nyimpa kor no
column3: osiandɛ nna nyimpadodow wɔ hɔ ntsi Jesus atwe noho efi hɔ."

column2: "N’ekyir no Jesus hun no asɔrfi mu na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: wo ho ayɛ wo dzen: mma nnyɛ bɔn bio
column5: mma dza omuo kyɛn yi aammba wo do."

column2: "Nyimpa no sii mu kɛkaa kyerɛɛ Jewfo no dɛ Jesus na ɔmaa no ho yɛɛ no dzen."
"Dɛm ntsi na Jewfo no hiahiaa Jesus ho
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛɛ ndzɛmba yi ahomgyeda."

column2: "Na Jesus buaa hɔn dɛ
column3: M’Egya yɛ edwuma bodu sesei na mo so meyɛ edwuma."

column2: "Na dɛm siantsir yi tsitsir ntsi na Jewfo no hwehwɛɛ dɛ woku no
column3: osiandɛ nnyɛ ahomgyeda nko na ɔato
column4: na eso ɔfrɛɛ Nyankopɔn nankasa n’Egya
column5: dze yɛɛ noho dɛ ɔnye Nyankopɔn yɛ pɛr."

column2: "Na Jesus buae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Meka no nokwar mu kyerɛ hom dɛ
column4: Ɔba no nankasa nntum nnhyɛ noho nnyɛ hwee
column5: gyedɛ dza ohu Egya no dɛ ɔyɛ; na biribiara a Egya no yɛ no
column6: ɔnoara Ɔba no so yɛ no dɛmara."

column2: "Na Egya no dɔ Ɔba no
column3: na ɔkyerɛ no dza nankasa yɛ no nyina
column4: na ɔbɛkyerɛ no ndwuma a ɔkyɛn yinom

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ Egya no nyan ewufo na ɔma hɔn nkwa no
column3: dɛmara so na Ɔba no dze nkwa ma hɔn a ɔpɛ."

column2: "Na eso Egya no mmbu obiara atsɛn
column3: na ɔdze atsɛmbu nyina ahyɛ Ɔba no nsa
column6: dɛ mbrɛ wodzi Egya no nyi. Nyia onndzi Ɔba no nyi no
column7: onndzi Egya a ɔsomaa no no so nyi."

column2: "Mereka akyerɛ hom nokwar mu dɛ
column3: nyia ɔtse m’asɛm
column4: na ɔgye nyia ɔsomaa me no dzi no
column7: na mbom oetwa mu efi owu mu aba nkwa mu."

column2: "Mereka akyerɛ hom wɔ nokwar mu pi dɛ
column3: dɔn no reba na enya edu a ewufo bɛtse Nyankopɔn Ba no ne ndze
column4: na hɔn a wɔbɛtse no benya nkwa."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ Egya no wɔ nkwa wɔ nankasa no mu no
column3: dɛmara so na ɔdze maa Ɔba no dɛ onnya nkwa wɔ nankasa no mu."

column2: "Na ɔmaa no tum dɛ ombu atsɛn so
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛ Onyimpa Ba."

column2: "Mma yi nnyɛ hom nwanwa: na dɔn no reba a hɔn a wɔwɔ nda mu nyina bɛtse me ndze
column4: "na wɔasoɛr epue; na hɔn a wɔayɛ papa no
column5: bɔkɔ nkwa wunyan mu; na hɔn a wɔayɛ dza omuo no

column2: "Mankasa munntum mennhyɛ moho nnyɛ hwee; dza metse no nna mubu ho atsɛn
column3: na m’atsɛmbu tsen
column4: osiandɛ monnhwehwɛ dza mankasa mepɛ
column5: na dza nyia ɔsomaa me no pɛ a."

column2: "Sɛ mankasa midzi moho dase a
column3: me dasee nnyɛ nokwar."

column2: "Obi wɔ hɔ a odzi mo ho dase
column3: na minyim dɛ ne dasee a odzi wɔ mo ho no yɛ nokwar."

column2: "Hom somae kɔr John hɔ
column3: na ɔagye nokwar no ho dase:"

column2: "na emi dze
column3: menngye nyimpa hɔ dase
column4: na meka yinom ama hom eenya nkwa."

column2: "Ɔno nye kandzea a ɔdzɛw na ɔhyerɛn
column3: na hom pɛɛ dɛ hom enyi gye wɔ ne kan mu mber kakra."

column2: "Na emi dze
column3: mowɔ dasefo a ɔkyɛn John
column4: na ndwuma a Egya no dze ama me dɛ munwie no
column5: ndwuma a meyɛ noara gye mo ho dase dɛ Egya no na ɔasoma me."

column2: "Na Egya no a ɔsomaa me no nankasa agye mo ho dase. Hom nntsee ne ndze da
column3: eso hom nnhun no su

column2: "na hom nnyi n’asɛm tse hom mu
column3: osiandɛ nyia ɔsomaa no no
column4: hom nngye no nndzi."

column2: "Hom hwehwɛ kyerɛwsɛm no mu
column3: osiandɛ hom susu dɛ yinom mu na hom wɔ onnyiewiei nkwa; naaso yinom nye dza wɔgye mo ho dase
column5: "na hom mmpɛ dɛ hom ba me nkyɛn ma hom eenya nkwa."

column2: "Menngye enyimnyam wɔ nyimpa hɔ."
"Na minyim hom dɛ hom nnyi Nyankopɔn no dɔ wɔ hom mu."
"Emi dze
column3: menam m’Egya dzin do maba
column4: na hom nngye me; sɛ obi nam nankasa ne dzin do ba a

column2: "Hom bɛyɛ dɛn etum agye edzi
column3: hom a hom gye enyimnyam wɔ homho nkorkor
column4: na hom nnhwehwɛ enyimnyam a ofi Nyankopɔn hɔ ba no?"

column2: "Mma hom nnsusu dɛ emi na mobɔkɔ akɔtoa hom ama Egya no
column3: na nyia ɔtoa hom wɔ hɔ
column4: mekyerɛ Moses a hom dze hom werɛ atwer no no."

column2: "Na sɛ hom agye Moses edzi a
column3: nkyɛ hom bɛgye mo so edzi; osiandɛ nankasa kyerɛɛw mo ho nsɛm."

column2: "Na sɛ hom nngye ne kyerɛw no nndzi a
column3: hom bɛyɛ dɛn etum agye m’asɛm edzi?"
